name: Menagerie: Archive
description:
You have been lucky enough to be tasked with sorting the files in one of many archives across the land. However, you must share your income with 3 fellow citizens of a similar rank, and consequently decide their fate.

The first spinoff of Exoptable Money and Presentable Liberty

It's not a sequel, it's a spinoff - remember that

Really, this isn't Menagerie III - I'm not ready for that

720p is clearly the best resolution for everything

800+ possible letters - who even wants that many

Still no cat

Wacky ball included
